mapper.update: update blog set title = #{title}, logo = #{logo} where no = ( select no from users where id = #{id})
mapper.select: select no, title, logo from blog where user_no = ( select no from users where id = #{id})
select a.no, a.name, b.id as id from category a, users b where a.blog_no = b.no and blog_no = ( select no from users where id = #{id})

select a.no as no, title, a.reg_date as regDate, c.id as id, b.no as categoryNo from post a, category b, users c where a.category_no = b.no and c.no = b.blog_no and b.blog_no = ( select no from users where id = #{id}) and a.category_no = #{no} order by a.no desc;
select title, a.content as content from post a, category b, users c where a.category_no = b.no and b.blog_no = ( select no from users where id = #{id}) order by a.no desc limit 0,1;
select title, a.content as content from post a, category b where a.category_no = b.no and b.blog_no = ( select no from users where id = #{id}) and a.no = #{no}
